de.hsb.ms.syn.common.interfaces

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.interfaces.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidConnection, DesktopConnection

    public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Facade representing a connection endpoint, either implemented by the smart device or the PC end (and by different means depending on the kind of connection that is attempted)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
